sqlMap.select: SELECT ASSESSMENTID as assessmentid, NAME as name, PRODUCTID as productid, TYPE as type, FORMID as formid, PRODUCT_TYPEID as productTypeid, LEVELID as levelid FROM ASSESSMENT_DIM WHERE ASSESSMENTID = #assessmentid:NUMERIC#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO ASSESSMENT_DIM ( ASSESSMENTID, NAME, PRODUCTID, TYPE, FORMID, PRODUCT_TYPEID, LEVELID ) VALUES ( #assessmentid:NUMERIC#, #name:VARCHAR#, #productid:NUMERIC#, #type:VARCHAR#, #formid:NUMERIC#, #productTypeid:NUMERIC#, #levelid:NUMERIC# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE ASSESSMENT_DIM SET NAME = #name:VARCHAR#, PRODUCTID = #productid:NUMERIC#, TYPE = #type:VARCHAR#, FORMID = #formid:NUMERIC#, PRODUCT_TYPEID = #productTypeid:NUMERIC#, LEVELID = #levelid:NUMERIC# WHERE ASSESSMENTID = #assessmentid:NUMERIC#
